projects.name: wyattsweet.com
projects.description: My personal site where I'm collecting the projects I'm working on and writing about topics I'm interested in.

projects.name: Thredup
projects.description: As a Sofware Engineer at thredUP, I worked on the UI for the company's main site. I worked as part of a fast paced, cross-functional agile team developing on our large scale, highly trafficed react app. I built new features and maintaitned existing ones. In addition to building new features, I was responsible for fixing cross-browser, cross-device UI bugs and I refactored large sections of legacy code.

projects.name: Salesforce
projects.description: At Salesforce, I built and worked on a number of full-stack applications for both internal and external use. I wrote custom ruby code to help customers migrate data over to the platform. I solved a variety of technical issues related to front and back end code. And I utilized HTML, CSS and JavaScript to customize Desk support centers for large clients.
